p: The Rab11 pathway is known to be involved in the IAV budding process [ 172]. Rab11 is a small GTP-binding protein that traffics proteins and vesicles between the trans-Golgi network (TGN), recycling endosome and apical membrane [ 173, 174, 175]. Knockout of Rab11 has also led to a reduction of M2 surface levels [ 176], proposing a role for Rab11 in the apical delivery of M2.
